attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the smoking ban is an outrage to most people that know it is hard to quit. instead of making this "law" and wasting time and effort for it only to fair. shouldn't the government make more use of there money by making public smoking areas?
if people want to stop smoking it is p to them but they should be a rule against smoking in area's where others do not wish to be engulfed in smoke. it should be a choice not a law!!!

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Smokingchoice/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
